'Ethane' is a chemical compound with chemical formula
C 2H 6. At standard temperature and pressure, ethane is a
colorless, odorless gas. Ethane is isolated on an industrial scale from natural
gas, and as a byproduct of petroleum refining. Its chief use is as petrochemical
feedstock for ethylene production.
